review_title: I might have watched this before on Vive

one_reviews_text: Great work, and through this film I feel like I'm really at the scene of the Rivot trial. The form of black and white animation made me feel the tension of the atmosphere, the gap between black and white.

At first, I was unsure if this was a second piece, in which I was missing the beginning. I am referring to the #2 in the title. It isn't the case, it's just the title. 
 This is a really interesting film, the art style brings the trial & testimony to life. Pretty powerful!
